content:
Deleting this server will revoke access for all users, and its settings will be permanently erased.
 To use the server again, you will need to set it up from scratch.

comment.text: This text provides a warning message displayed within a dialog box when a user attempts to delete a server. It explains that deleting the server will remove all user access and settings, requiring a complete re-setup to use it again. This description helps users understand the permanent consequences of server deletion.

usage.context:
return (
 <ModalDialog visible displayType={ModalDialogType.modal} onClose={onClose}>
 <ModalDialog.Header>{t("AISettings:DeleteServer")}</ModalDialog.Header>
 <ModalDialog.Body>
 <Text>{t("AISettings:DeleteServerDescription")}</Text>
 </ModalDialog.Body>
 <ModalDialog.Footer>
 <Button
 primary
 size={ButtonSize.normal}
